page.syntax: Group_ID as C = a5_sec_get_gid(C group ,C dd )

argument.name: Group_ID
argument.description: The ID of a group of users.

argument.name: group
argument.description: The name of a group of users, as Defined for database object security purposes.

argument.name: dd
argument.description: The data dictionary for the database.

page.discussion: The A5_SEC_GET_GID() function returns a group ID from a group name. This function is used to supply the group ID for A5_GROUP_HAS_PERMISSION(). Limitations: Desktop applications only.
